fpmExplorer:Page.title: Custom Actions
fpmExplorer:Page.introduction: The Chart building block enables you to define custom actions as toolbar buttons and menu items. This example shows a standalone action, a selection-dependent action, and an action group.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Custom Actions
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: Add custom actions using macrosChart:Action elements within the macros:actions aggregation. These actions can be positioned relative to annotation-based actions.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Selection-Dependent Actions
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: Create actions that are only enabled when chart items are selected by setting requiresSelection='true'.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Action Groups
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: Group related actions together using macrosChart:ActionGroup to create dropdown menus in the chart toolbar.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Action Event Handlers
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: Implement event handlers in the controller to respond to action presses. Selection-dependent actions can access selected chart contexts.
